INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_COMM_CALC_MTD (COMM_CALC_MTD_ID, CMPNY_CDE, CALC_MTD_CDE, COMM_CALC_MTD_DESCR, COMM_FR_CDE, COMM_TYP_CDE, COMM_BASE_VAL_CDE, COMM_CALC_TYP_CDE, COMM_HLDP_AMT, COMM_HLDP_RATE, PAY_CCY_CDE, IS_OBSOL, TIER_COMM_BASE_VAL_CDE, MIN_COMM_AMT, MAX_COMM_AMT, FIX_RATE, FIX_AMT, ADDTN_FIX_AMT, IS_ADVANCE_SETG, IS_AE_RB_CMPNY_BSLN_PRTCT, VER_STAT, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.commCalcMtdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.cmpnyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.calcMtdCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commCalcMtdDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commFrCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commTypCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commBaseValCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commCalcTypCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.commHldpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.commHldpRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.payCcyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isObsol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tierCommBaseValCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.minCommAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.maxCommAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.fixRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.fixAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.addtnFixAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.isAdvanceSetg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isAeRbCmpnyBslnPrtct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.verStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
